title: Storytelling-Based International Trade Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Optimized for post-COVID-19 online educational settings, structured around asynchronous learning with considerations for internet connectivity challenges.

learning_goals: Learners can apply INCOTERMS rules with 80% accuracy by analyzing real-world trade case storytelling.
After asynchronous module learning, learners achieve at least level 3 on a 4-stage evaluation rubric for negotiation strategy development in trade dispute scenarios.
Learners can create visual materials for trade processes using digital storytelling tools (e.g., Sway).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
